name: Fish Poppers - The Exploding Beach Puzzle Game!
name_original: Fish Poppers - The Exploding Beach Puzzle Game!
description:
BANG! Goes a chain reaction of EXPLODING FISH!! :)

BUT... only if you haven't RUN OUT OF TAPS!

Can you work out the right taps to BLOW UP ALL THE FISH??

There is usually more than one way... but not always! ;)

Stuck? Get a hint to help with the next fish to EXPLODE!!

» Great fun app which is great for all ages!!
» Puzzling game with satisfying EXPLOSIONS!!
» So many levels!!
» iOS8, iPad Air, iPhone 6 and 6 Plus ready!!

Note: This app contains the ability to purchase optional content using real money. If you don't want this feature, disable payment features in your device in-app purchases settings.

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
